{"id":957046247,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1685015143,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"151 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/957046247/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sum in a Matrix","memory":"48 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int matrixSum(vector<vector<int>>& nums) {\n        int matrixSum = 0, colMax;\n        \n        for(auto &num : nums) {\n            sort(num.begin(), num.end());\n        }\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < nums[0].size(); i++) {\n            colMax = 0;\n            for(int j = 0; j < nums.size(); j++) {\n                colMax = max(colMax, nums[j][i]);\n            }\n            matrixSum += colMax;\n            //cout << colMax << \" + \";\n        }\n        \n        return matrixSum;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sum-in-a-matrix","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
